publishers
Interface ICurrentMarketPublisher

All Superinterfaces:
IPublisher
All Known Implementing Classes:
CurrentMarketPublisherImpl
public interface ICurrentMarketPublisher
extends IPublisher

This interface serves as an extension to the IPublisher interface, adding a method to publish current market updates.

Author:
Urvi

 void publishCurrentMarket(MarketDataDTO mdDTO)
          Sends out market updates to all users who have subscribed to a specified stock symbol.

Method Detail

publishCurrentMarket

void publishCurrentMarket(MarketDataDTO mdDTO)
                          throws InvalidArgumentException
Sends out market updates to all users who have subscribed to a specified stock symbol.

Parameters:
mdDTO - The MarketDataDTO object that encapsulates all data related to the current market.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException
